itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Silver Ore.

item.name: Silver Ore
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Silver Ore requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Silver.

item.name: Yuria Necklace
item.desc: A necklace possessed with a hatred for Humankind.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of necklace, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Bares Necklace
item.desc: A necklace that draws out hidden destructive energy.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of necklace, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Hesus Necklace
item.desc: A necklace that gives speed and agility to the wearer.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of necklace, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Elisha Necklace
item.desc: A necklace that gives serenity to its wearer.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of necklace, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Kalis Necklace
item.desc: A necklace emitting an aura that increases concentration.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of necklace, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Talis Necklace
item.desc: A necklace infused with the energy of steel.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of necklace, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Shining Empty Bottle
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for storing water.\n- Usage: Can be used to collect water on the beach or along rivers.\n- Gathering Time: - 15 sec

item.name: Hardened Empty Bottle
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for storing water.\n- Usage: Can be used to collect water on the beach or along rivers.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec

item.name: Resplendent Emerald Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Resplendent Emerald.

item.name: Resplendent Ruby Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Resplendent Ruby.

item.name: Silver Ingot
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Silver Ore. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.
